name: Roland Busch
text: Today #Siemens COO & CTO @BuschRo said @IoTClan in Berlin: SMEs can stay competitive if they, make use of the great #IoT potential. To advance with their digital transformation, companies must think beyond technologies #IoT #IoTClan #industrie40 /ya//t.co/Mxa1u5BdU6

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo Fully agree. Shortage of talent for example is a real and pressing problem for most businesses wanting to adopt AI as well as move to other data-driven models of digital transformation.

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo Lack of a strategic approach to AI adoption is another barrier . The result is often AI initiatives that aren't planned at a strategic level, fail to address strategic business objectives and don't fit within an organization's overall plans for growth and business development.

name: Roland Busch
text: #IndustrialAI can transform economies mainly in 3 ways: intelligent automation, augmented intelligence & disruptive innovation. An example of intelligent automation: we tell robots what to do, and they decide for themselves how to perform the task//t.co/wX6YVdoEbs #AI

name: Roland Busch
text: #IndustrialAI can transform economies mainly in 3 ways: intelligent automation, augmented intelligence & disruptive innovation. An example of intelligent automation: we tell robots what to do, and they decide for themselves how to perform the task//t.co/wX6YVdoEbs #AI

name: Roland Busch
text: So what hinders the widespread adoption of #IndustrialAI? In my view, there are 5 key barriers: data challenges, reluctance to share data, #IoT, #AI skills shortage, #cybersecurity & risk. #digitaltransformation//t.co/fDs9GCX7a6

name: Roland Busch
text: Customers don't simply want a product like a motor anymore. They want to know how we can help them become more competitive and the answer lies in greater #digitalization and customisation, Sunil Mathur , MD & CEO, Siemens Ltd, India @FortuneIndia //t.co/MriutLYUzu

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo When it comes to putting organizations on the path to higher levels of efficiency, better products and faster time to market, industrial AI is the new king of the road. It's not just a key to competitive advantage, it is now a requirement for survival in many industries.

name: Roland Busch
text: How is #industrialAI different from #AI? Well it's very different from consumer AI which is often used for things like movie recommendations. Industrial AI is about solving real world problems and it requires domain knowhow, as well as AI expertise. #IIoT #DigitalTransformation//t.co/z7Ket4lwbt

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo @Siemens @mirko_ross @grattongirl @fogoros @TheDataAgent @Paul4innovating @AngelikaLattner @WSWMUC @antgrasso @YvesMulkers Sometimes you only need to create a culture where people can try and break things. Being brave is far more important than having a big budget or the perfect technology.Resilience for change should be the engine behind #digitaltransformation.

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo @Siemens @mirko_ross @AkwyZ @grattongirl @fogoros @TheDataAgent @Paul4innovating @AngelikaLattner @WSWMUC @antgrasso @YvesMulkers IoT digital transformation projects start with a business discussion not technology.This sounds very obvious, but in some companies, the bridge between technology and business problems hasn't always been made as strong as it needs to be.

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo @Siemens @mirko_ross @AkwyZ @grattongirl @fogoros @TheDataAgent @Paul4innovating @AngelikaLattner @WSWMUC @antgrasso @YvesMulkers Interconnected digital innovation ecosystem is the key! Integrated technology platforms, connecting functions, are essential in the era of #digitaltransformation . No more siloed practices!

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo @Siemens @mirko_ross @AkwyZ @grattongirl @fogoros @TheDataAgent @Paul4innovating @AngelikaLattner @WSWMUC @antgrasso @YvesMulkers Domain expertise is critical with a clear understanding of why current process measuring is done. Question should then be is this the best way to achieve the outcome with available technology. Change management during and after the initiative is also critical.

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo @Siemens @mirko_ross @AkwyZ @grattongirl @fogoros @TheDataAgent @Paul4innovating @AngelikaLattner @WSWMUC @antgrasso @YvesMulkers Preparing for the 4th industrial revolution requires leadership & action. In #Germany & #Australia we have a framework for societal transformation which includes addressing #skills, #standards, #cyber-security, application of R&D & testlabs for industry @The_AiGroup @AMGC_Ltd

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo @Siemens @mirko_ross @AkwyZ @grattongirl @fogoros @TheDataAgent @Paul4innovating @AngelikaLattner @WSWMUC @antgrasso @YvesMulkers Correct. Additionally we need the focus on the customer problem we want to solve - the tangible value we create. That's why we often co-create with customers to make sure we deliver what matters!

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo @Siemens @mirko_ross @AkwyZ @grattongirl @fogoros @TheDataAgent @Paul4innovating @AngelikaLattner @WSWMUC @antgrasso @YvesMulkers Yes, we need secure platforms and #Cybersecurity awareness to have #trust in using digital solutions. Trust will speed up digitalization.

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo @Siemens @AkwyZ @grattongirl @fogoros @TheDataAgent @Paul4innovating @AngelikaLattner @WSWMUC @antgrasso @YvesMulkers Don't forget to mention the most import factor: trained and #cybersec aware People

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo @Siemens @mirko_ross @AkwyZ @grattongirl @fogoros @TheDataAgent @Paul4innovating @AngelikaLattner @WSWMUC @antgrasso @YvesMulkers I would add the ability to co-create with our customers, awareness of our customers' customers expectations (e.g. @siemensmobility, we speak about #passengerexperience) & a passionate team at the forefront of digitalization!

name: Roland Busch
text: @BuschRo @Siemens @mirko_ross @AkwyZ @grattongirl @fogoros @TheDataAgent @Paul4innovating @AngelikaLattner @WSWMUC @antgrasso @YvesMulkers Couldn't agree more with the winning three: 1. deep domain know how, 2. a leading, secure platform and 3. an active ecosystem adding to this highly motivated agile teams with a clear design thinking approach and willingness to try and learn it becomes unbeatable

name: Roland Busch
text: #AI is an opportunity if we come up w/ ideas for shaping it in a positive way & turning #ArtificialIntelligence into a job engine. We have to keep in mind that just as humans have guided & driven the development of AI to this day, they'll continue to lead in the future. @wef

name: Roland Busch
text: @antgrasso @BuschRo @AngelikaLattner @AnjaHoffmann @akwyz @Paul4innovating @TopCyberNews @ralph_ohr @TheDataAgent @grattonboy @grattongirl @fogoros @WSWMUC @IIoT_World It impossible to tell future benefits, when you are in middle of paradigm shift. But at all a simple rule can be applied: Be a mover or getting moved.

name: Roland Busch
text: The #digital world moves at different speeds. We might be using the same words but the impact around the world is completely different. #Digitaltransformation is a good example. Answering my question, @BuschRo @Siemens CTO tells us about is perspective.//t.co/vfYVxKPbOy

name: Roland Busch
text: One of the big issues of Mindsphere is #data ownership. Most companies don't like their data to leave their premise. Answering my question on this, @BuschRo explains that #MindSphere can be used completely autonomously by an organisation and data remains in servers on premise.

name: Roland Busch
text: We're very pleased to be named a #sustainability leader in #DJSI. Sustainability will remain a major success factor for @Siemens and thus also for our customers. We're one of the first major industrial companies aiming to achieve a worldwide net-zero #carbon footprint by 2030.

name: Roland Busch
text: While #AutonomousVehicles are still a thing of the future, the driverless #Metro in #Nuremberg celebrates 10 years operation this month. #Driverless operation can increase capacity by up to 50% as #trains can travel in shorter intervals. That's what I call #SmartMobility! #AI

name: Roland Busch
text: @mirko_ross @Siemens @MunSecConf @Microsoft All activities to push #Cybersecurity like @Microsoft's proposal are welcome. #CharterOfTrust calls for collaboration between governments, business and NGOs to foster #cybersecurity & proactively protect #IoT assets from #cyberattacks. name: Roland Busch
text: To foster growth in #IoT & #digital economy, it's crucial that we develop #cybersafe products based on common standards. That's why @Siemens and partners developed the #CharterOfTrust which we'll present @MunSecConf on Friday. Together we can put #cybersecurity on a new footing.
